title: Quickinsure
description: An insurance comparison service with an MIS built in Ruby on Rails. Worked as a full-stack developer in a team of 5

title: Frontend for Apps at Media.net
description: Part of the front-end team for webapps having more than a million impressions per day.

title: LearnAwesome
description: An open source platform for expolring the best learning resources for every topic. Built in Ruby on Rails, worked at the initial stages as a full-stack developer.

title: Personal blog (This website)
description: Personal portfolio and a place where I publish my writings. Built in GatsbyJs, React.

title: Game of Shares
description: A share market simulator to learn the basics of share market built in PHP, MySQL. A hobby project built in college which went viral for a short period of time among 300+ students.

title: BookShare
description: A web portal acting as a community for the book readers of the college WCE, Sangli built in PHP, MySQL, had 75+ active happy users when active.

title: Days Until
description: A simple Chrome extension I built which gained 3000+ weekly active users organically and was featured on ProductHunt.
